amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: ? TITLE VIII--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS ? SEC. 801. Total appropriations made in this Act are hereby reduced by $598,390,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the overall funding of the bill by $590 million or 1 percent.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hefley amendment (A076) Failed by recorded vote: 94 - 316 (Roll no. 348).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A076) offered by Mr. Hefley.
